casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Cornelius PRATT. No. 315P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 25, 2007. Cornelius Pratt, Pro Se. Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, John Snyder, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 14th day of June 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th day of January 2007."

Justice HUDSON recused.
